versions.changelog:
IMPROVEMENT: Better error messages for provider connection failures.

**What's New:**
- Provider status now shows specific error messages instead of generic 'Failed'
- Helps diagnose connection issues with detailed error information
- Error messages indicate specific problems:
  - Hostname resolution failures
  - Connection refused (server down or wrong URL)
  - Timeout issues
  - Credential validation errors

**Why This Helps:**
Instead of just seeing 'Failed. Check server logs.', you'll now see messages like:
- 'Failed: Cannot resolve server hostname. Check Base URL.'
- 'Failed: Connection refused. Server may be down or Base URL is incorrect.'
- 'Failed: Request timeout. Server may be slow or unreachable.'

This makes it much easier to diagnose and fix connection problems without having to dig through server logs.

CRITICAL FIX: Prevents plugin from crashing on startup when provider connection fails.

**Changes:**
- Channels now return empty results instead of throwing exceptions
- Added defensive checks for plugin instance availability  
- Improved error handling in flattened view methods
- This should fix the persistent 'Restart' status issue

**What this fixes:**
- Plugin status stuck on 'Restart' even after rebooting
- Plugin failing to start when Xtream provider connection is unavailable
- Libraries disappearing when provider connection fails

The plugin will now start successfully even if the provider connection fails, allowing you to fix the connection issue without the plugin being stuck in a restart loop.

CRITICAL FIX: Restored VOD and Series libraries. Added comprehensive error handling in ParseName to prevent channels from breaking. Includes fallback to original name if processing fails or results in empty title.
Fixed country code prefix filtering: Added null check and improved regex pattern to properly strip '| NL |' prefixes and prevent errors.
Added automatic filtering of country code prefixes (e.g., | NL |, | DE |) from series names for better metadata matching with TMDB/TVDB.
Added explicit check for non-empty episodes collection. This ensures episodes are only returned when they actually exist.
Simplified GetEpisodes to use TryGetValue pattern correctly. This should fix episodes not appearing when clicking on seasons.
Fixed missing episodes in series view by adding configuration check and safe season lookup in GetEpisodes method.

## New Features: Flat Series & VOD View

This release adds the ability to display all series and movies directly without category folders.

### Features
- ✅ Flat series view option in configuration
- ✅ Flat VOD view option in configuration
- ✅ Shows all series/movies directly from selected categories
- ✅ Maintains hierarchy (seasons/episodes for series)
- ✅ Backward compatible (opt-in features)

### How to Use
1. Install the plugin from the repository
2. Go to Plugins → Xtream → Series tab
   - Enable "Flatten Series View" checkbox
3. Go to Plugins → Xtream → Video On-Demand tab
   - Enable "Flatten VOD View" checkbox
4. Save and refresh your library

### Changes
- Added FlattenSeriesView configuration property
- Added FlattenVodView configuration property
- Modified SeriesChannel to support flat view
- Modified VodChannel to support flat view
- Updated UI with checkboxes for both features
- Version bumped to 0.9.1.0

## New Feature: Flat Series View

This release adds the ability to display all series directly without category folders.

### Features
- ✅ Flat series view option in configuration
- ✅ Shows all series directly from selected categories
- ✅ Maintains season/episode hierarchy
- ✅ Backward compatible (opt-in feature)

### How to Use
1. Install the plugin from the repository
2. Go to Plugins → Xtream → Series tab
3. Enable "Flatten Series View" checkbox
4. Save and refresh your library

### Changes
- Added FlattenSeriesView configuration property
- Modified SeriesChannel to support flat view
- Updated UI with checkbox control
- Version bumped to 0.9.0.0
